name: Alcatraz Prison Escape 3-D - The Gangstar Jail Break-out Sim-ulator
name_original: Alcatraz Prison Escape 3-D - The Gangstar Jail Break-out Sim-ulator
description: Escape out of PRISON! Game one of the Alcatraz prison break series. A mofia city gangster vegas crime city lord can't live a death row prison life. In his X life he was a mobster war gangstar city hitman sniper shooter, and sniper assassin for hire. Bank robbery games were his jam! In this fps shooter game jail break is the only way. Don't be stuck as a worker bee prison builder in this prison game. This game is a bit different from other prison escape games as its more of a shoot em up dead trigger shot gun style. After your break out you must escape the cops! Through the gang city and finding yourself in a bank robbery simulation heist game. Unlock cool guns and knifes to help in your jailbreak quest.
